questions.question: If the convergence criteria is not satisfied

answers.a: you may or may not get the root of the equation
answers.b: then you will not get the root of the equation

questions.question: New improved approximation of root is given by

answers.c: $$ x_2 = x_1 - \frac{f(x_1)}{f'(x_1)}, \quad f'(x_1) → \text{at only first guess}  \ $$
